revision.text:
'''Fossils''' are petrified organic relics that can be unearthed in the [[Underground]]. They may either be traded for [[Plate|Shard Plates]] or objects that can be sold for [[Diamonds]], or put into the hatchery to obtain Fossil Pokémon. Fossils generally can only be obtained upon reaching the region the Pokémon they yield can be found in. However, by utilizing the Daily Deals of the Underground fossils may be obtained (but not bred) in earlier regions. =Released= {| class="wikitable" |- ! Region !! Fossil !! Mine layout !!
